div.p: Flag_of_Bulgaria.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,000 × 600 pixels, file size: 288 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.div: Словѣ́ньскъ / ⰔⰎⰑⰂⰡⰐⰠⰔⰍⰟ: ꙁна́мѧ Блъгарі́ꙗ, Ⰸⱀⰰ́ⰿⱏ Ⰱⰾⱏⰳⰰⱃⰺ́ⱔ
Français : Le Drapeau de la Bulgarie

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: The flag of Bulgaria. The colors are specified at http://www.government.bg/cgi-bin/e-cms/vis/vis.pl?s=001&p=0034&n=000005&g= as:

div.style: text-align: center; background: #ffe; margin: .75em 15%; padding: .5em; border: 1px solid #e3e3b0; direction: ltr;

td.div: This file is lacking author information.

table.style: border:2px solid #d3d3d3; background-color:white; clear: both; margin: 0.5em auto; width:100%; text-align:center; cellpadding:0px; direction:ltr;

tr.td: It is easy to put a border around this image:

p.span: العربية | Беларуская (тарашкевіца) | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Galego | Hrvatski | Magyar | Հայերեն | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | Bahasa Melayu | Malti | Nederlands | ‪Norsk (bokmål)‬ | Polski | Português | Runa Simi | Română | Русский | Slovenčina | Српски / Srpski | Türkçe | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 06:59, 15 August 2008 The hexademical colors as described in the law of the national flag and as described on http://www.government.bg/cgi-bin/e-cms/vis/vis.pl?s=001&p=0034&n=5&g=)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:02, 26 June 2010
